amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the provisions of the bill would not apply if the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Administration, in consultation with the Clean Air Scientific Advisory Committee, finds that the application of any section could harm human health or the environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-607 to provide that the provisions of the bill would not apply if the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Administration, in consultation with the Clean Air Scientific Advisory Committee, finds that the application of any section could harm human health or the environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 239 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 239 (Roll no. 280).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Norton.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
